title: The Best Case of 2018 Gets An UPGRADE
description: The PC-O11 Dynamic was chosen as our best case of 2018 and at CES 2019 Lian Li showed an upgraded version.    Many thanks to our sponsors for this show:  Thermaltake Razer MSI Corsair Phanteks  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #lianlio11 #lianlipccases #hardwarecanucks
